summary: Anna returns home after a stint in a mental hospital, but her recovery is jeopardized by her cruel stepmother and ghastly visions of her dead mother.
cast: Emily Browning|Arielle Kebbel|David Strathairn|Elizabeth Banks|Maya Massar|Kevin McNulty|Jesse Moss|Dean Paul Gibson|Don S. Davis|Lex Burnham|Matthew Bristol|Daniel Bristol|Heather Doerksen|Alf Humphreys|Ryan Cowie|Troy Rudolph|John Prowse|C.A. Fraser Bain
director: Directors: Charles Guard (as The Guard Brothers), Thomas Guard (as The Guard Brothers)
title: Presencias extrañas
